Group.Text: เลขหนังสือ

Query.SQL: SELECT [ID] ,[BookNo] as [BOOKNO] ,[PageNo] as [PAGENO] ,[PageVersion] as [PAGEVERSION] ,[ImgUrl] as [IMGURL] ,[PageStatus] as [PAGESTATUS] ,[ScanDate] as [SCANDATE] ,[ScanBy] as [SCANBY] ,[DataEntryDate] [DATAENTRYDATE] ,[DataEntryBy] as [DATAENTRYBY] ,SummitDate as [SUBMITDATE] ,SummitBy as [SUBMITBY] ,[ApproveDate] as [APPROVEDATE] ,[ApproveBy] as [APPROVEBY] ,[CreateDate] as [CREATEDATE] ,[CreateBy] as [CREATEBY] ,[UpdateBy] as [UPDATEDATE] ,[UpdateBy] as [UPDATEBY] FROM [GunRegBook].[dbo].[Page] WHERE PageStatus != 'Delete'

Query.SQL: SELECT TOP 10 [ID] ,[UserName] as [USERNAME] ,[Menu] as [MENU] ,[Process] as [PROCESS] ,Replace([Param],'''','') as [PARAM] ,[Result] as [RESULT] ,[CreateDate] as [CREATEDATE] FROM [GunRegBook].[dbo].[Logs] WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY ID desc

Query.SQL: SELECT [ID] ,[BookNo] as [BOOKNO] ,[BookYear] as [BOOKYEAR] ,[GunRegIDStart] as [GUNREGIDSTART] ,[GunRegIDEnd] as [GUNREGIDEND] ,[PageTotal] as [PAGETOTAL] ,[BookStatus] as [BOOKSTATUS] ,[Destrory_Date] as [DESTRORYDATE] ,[CreateDate] as [CREATEDATE] ,[CreateBy] as [CREATEBY] ,[UpdateDate] as [UPDATEDATE] ,[UpdateBy] as [UPDATEBY] FROM [GunRegBook].[dbo].[Book] WHERE BookStatus = 'Delete'

Query.SQL: SELECT [ID] ,[BookNo] as [BOOKNO] ,[BookYear] as [BOOKYEAR] ,[GunRegIDStart] as [GUNREGIDSTART] ,[GunRegIDEnd] as [GUNREGIDEND] ,[PageTotal] as [PAGETOTAL] ,[BookStatus] as [BOOKSTATUS] ,[Destrory_Date] as [DESTRORYDATE] ,[CreateDate] as [CREATEDATE] ,[CreateBy] as [CREATEBY] ,[UpdateDate] as [UPDATEDATE] ,[UpdateBy] as [UPDATEBY] FROM [GunRegBook].[dbo].[Book] WHERE BookStatus = 'Expired'

Query.SQL: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY [BookNo],[PAGENO]) as [ID] , [BOOKNO] ,[PAGENO] ,MAX([PAGEVERSION]) as [LASTVERSION] FROM [GunRegBook].[dbo].[Page] WHERE PageStatus != 'Delete'
